overview: In this reenactment of a propaganda documentary, a woman is falling prey to the role assigned to her in slow motion. Upon her arrest, diplomat Mária Kerényi is interviewed by the state television. Her story in espionage confronts the mechanisms of autocracy and the concept of guilt in a closed society.

production_companies.name: Moholy-Nagy University of Art and Design

title: Mária Kerényi, 41, July 1970
